channel.title: What source could I use for this project?
channel.description: I'm going to start on a project, and I will be using the sprites in my signature, professionally(enough) made models, and maybe if I can, add some customized animations. I don't care what revision it is, as long as I can write the sprites and import the models. Any suggestion what base I could use to do this?

item.title: What source could I use for this project?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I’m not sure, I don’t do good with clients.

Read full topic
item.source: What source could I use for this project?

item.title: What source could I use for this project?
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

I don’t know shit about 317 clients or deobs. Do you know which class I can write the sprites in?

Read full topic
item.source: What source could I use for this project?

item.title: What source could I use for this project?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:5, topic:451407”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=554301.msg4059741#msg4059741 date=1343327682]

they’re would be more things already developed for this sort’ve thing.

I don’t care if there is or isn’t, I will be re-doing it anyway.

I mean more tools for animations and whatnot.
[/quote]

Well, do you know any base I can use for this?[/quote]
I guess any 317, because I’ve seen a tool for each of the things you mentioned for 317 servers specifically.

Read full topic
